snippet: Two buyout bids illustrate the rising tide of shareholder power. | The Justice Department sues Bank of America over mortgage securities. | It would not be surprising to see Jeffrey P. Bezos worry little about turning a quick profit at The Washington...
abstract: Two buyout bids illustrate the rising tide of shareholder power. | The Justice Department sues Bank of America over mortgage securities. | It would not be surprising to see Jeffrey P. Bezos worry little about turning a quick profit at The Washington Post. | Cory A. Booker has obtained money for an Internet start-up from influential investors.
